The Log Data Usage Policy currently applies to all logs data in Sawmill infrastructure. Googlers storing logs data in other storage systems are expected to implement the policy by EOY 2020 or, with an exception, by end of H1 2021. If you have questions about complying with this policy, please reach out to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:logs-compliance@google.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"logs-compliance@google.com.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. You are responsible for the security of the data that you generate and for setting appropriate access controls. Data sharing is subject to the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://go/udap\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"User Data Access Policy\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", which limits what logs data or logs-derived data you may share both inside and outside Google.\\u000b3. Before sharing any log data, make sure it doesn't have any PII and SPII data, and other sensitive information.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TOOLS\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://go/paste\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"go/paste.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" If you don't have access, please work with your EPAM DM and Google manager.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. As an alternative solution, you could use a Google Doc with restricted access. But do not use email, or any other tool where you can't control who can access it without explicitly granted permissions.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3. Session Seeker (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://goto.google.com/seeker-getting-started\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"go/seeker-getting-started\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") is a tool for viewing individual log Sessions from Sessions logs. Tools such as Session Seeker must not allow Googlers to visually inspect multi-day sessions without approval from the Data Owner or delegate (for Sawmill, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:logs-access@\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"logs-access@\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") and an appropriate auditing program.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Open \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://g3doc.corp.google.com/company/teams/security-privacy/policies/privacy/modular_policies/logs_data/log-data-usage-rules.md?cl=head\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"this link\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to read more.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
